parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Your New Document Submission has been approved: @{outputs('Update_file_properties')?['body/{Name}']}
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Preview - Accepted Doc Email


Hey @{outputs('Get_user_profile_(V2)')?['body/displayName']}!

Thank you for your submission to Redwood Document Management.
Your document has been accepted!
If you need any help, don’t hesitate to reach out to us at documents@redwoodmaterials.com!
Thank you,
Document Management Team

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: New Document Failed to be created in pending library: @{variables('varFileName')}

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Preview - Rejection Email


Hi @{outputs('Get_user_profile_(V2)')?['body/displayName']}
Thank you for your submission to Redwood Document Management.
Your document has been rejected.
Please see rejection comments below: @{items('For_each_rejection')?['comments']}
Please click the link below to resubmit your document.
Resubmit Document
If you need any help, don’t hesitate to reach out to us at documents@redwoodmaterials.com!
Thank you,
Document Management Team

properties.description: Office 365 Users Connection provider lets you access user profiles in your organization using your Office 365 account. You can perform various actions such as get your profile, a user's profile, a user's manager or direct reports and also update a user profile.
